entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
